mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AT_MODEL_FUNCTION( MENU_CODE, F_NAME, F_TITLE, TABLE_INDEX, IS_SYSTEM, FUN_CODE, FUN_DESC, ID_PARENT, CONTROL_ID, CONTROL_TYPE, IS_HASTAG, CATEGORY, SHOW_INDEX, IS_CON_SHOWNUM, CONTROL_NUM, CONTROL_PAGE, OPERATOR, REMARK ) VALUES( #{menuCode}, #{fname}, #{ftitle}, #{tableIndex}, #{isSystem}, #{funCode}, #{funDesc}, #{idParent}, #{controlId}, #{controlType}, #{isHastag}, #{category}, #{showIndex}, #{isConShownum}, #{controlNum}, #{controlPage}, #{operator}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.ID as id, MENU_CODE as menuCode, F_NAME as fname, F_TITLE as ftitle, TABLE_INDEX as tableIndex, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, FUN_CODE as funCode, FUN_DESC as funDesc, ID_PARENT as idParent, CONTROL_ID as controlId, CONTROL_TYPE as controlType, IS_HASTAG as isHastag, CATEGORY as category, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, CREATE_TIME as createTime, OPERATOR as operator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_MODEL_FUNCTION c WHERE c.ID=#{id}

SELECT c.ID as id, MENU_CODE as menuCode, F_NAME as fname, F_TITLE as mdesc, TABLE_INDEX as tableIndex, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, FUN_CODE as funCode, FUN_DESC as funDesc, ID_PARENT as idParent, CONTROL_ID as controlId, CONTROL_TYPE as controlType, IS_HASTAG as isHastag, CATEGORY as category, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, CREATE_TIME as createTime, OPERATOR as operator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_MODEL_FUNCTION c ORDER BY showIndex

SELECT c.ID as id, MENU_CODE as menuCode, F_NAME as fname, F_TITLE as mdesc, TABLE_INDEX as tableIndex, IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, FUN_CODE as funCode, FUN_DESC as funDesc, ID_PARENT as idParent, CONTROL_ID as controlId, CONTROL_TYPE as controlType, IS_HASTAG as isHastag, CATEGORY as category, SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, CREATE_TIME as createTime, OPERATOR as operator, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, REMARK as remark FROM AT_MODEL_FUNCTION c where c.MENU_CODE = #{menuCode} ORDER BY showIndex

SELECT asm.M_NAME as mname, amf.ID as id, amf.MENU_CODE as menuCode, amf.F_NAME as fname, amf.F_TITLE as mdesc, amf.TABLE_INDEX as tableIndex, amf.IS_SYSTEM as isSystem, amf.FUN_CODE as funCode, amf.FUN_DESC as funDesc, amf.ID_PARENT as idParent, amf.CONTROL_ID as controlId, amf.CONTROL_TYPE as controlType, amf.IS_HASTAG as isHastag, amf.CATEGORY as category, amf.SHOW_INDEX as showIndex, amf.IS_CON_SHOWNUM as isConShownum, amf.CONTROL_NUM as controlNum, amf.CONTROL_PAGE as controlPage, amf.CREATE_TIME as createTime, amf.OPERATOR as operator, amf.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, amf.REMARK as remark FROM AT_MODEL_FUNCTION amf, AT_SYS_MODEL asm WHERE asm.MENU_CODE = amf.MENU_CODE and asm.TREE_ID = #{treeId} ORDER BY amf.SHOW_INDEX
